pkgmetadata.longdescription: This is a simple, easily extendible soap library that provides several usefultools for creating and publishing soap web services in python. This packagefeatures on-demand wsdl generation for the published services, awsgi-compliant web application, support for complex class structures, binaryattachments, simple framework for creating additional serialization mechanismsand a client library.This prokect now uses lxml as it's XML API, providing full namespace support.
